title: Toy Story 4
description:
This week on Spoiler Specials, Dan Kois, Forrest Wickman and Marissa Martinelli spoil Toy Story 4. What’s the logic of the Toy Story Universe? As we ask of all sequels, does this one deserve to exist? Does the movie succeed as a rom-com?   
Podcast production by Danielle Hewitt. Engineering by Merritt Jacob.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
